mapper.select: SELECT * FROM coffees ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coffees (productName, countryOfOrigin, degreeOfRoasting, aroma, acidity, bitterTaste, sweetTaste, rich, priceOf100g, priceOf200g) VALUES (#{productName}, #{countryOfOrigin}, #{degreeOfRoasting}, #{aroma}, #{acidity}, #{bitterTaste}, #{sweetTaste}, #{rich}, #{priceOf100g}, #{priceOf200g})
mapper.update: UPDATE coffees SET productName = #{productName}, countryOfOrigin = #{countryOfOrigin}, degreeOfRoasting = #{degreeOfRoasting}, aroma = #{aroma}, acidity = #{acidity}, bitterTaste = #{bitterTaste}, sweetTaste = #{sweetTaste}, rich = #{rich}, priceOf100g = #{priceOf100g}, priceOf200g = #{priceOf200g} WHERE id = #{id}
